p: Induction (due to dsRNA interaction with TLR3) of the second signaling pathway via regulatory molecules TRAF-6/RIP1 leads to increased activity of transcription factors NF-kB and AP-1 ( Fig. 1). This causes production of IFN and a number of pro-inflammatory cytokines (TNF-α, IL-1b, IL-6, IL-12, IL-18) [ 26– 28], involved in induction and regulation of a wide range of immune responses.
